comment: She's super strict on grading, kicked me out of class for checking my phone, when it came to withdraw deadline she told me she didn't wanna grade my work so I had to withdraw. Worst teacher I've ever had
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: She was amazing! It wouldn't let me select but I took her for 1102. She's very willing to help with zero judgment. Minor assignments are extra credit but you only get the credit by attending class. No phone policy so at times when the class is lecture heavy it's a bit disengaging, so participate in discussions.

She is great take this class. She makes it really easy to do all the assignments the d2l assignments and chill. It's a lot of prep work for each class but if you stay on top of it it's chill. If you don't do any of the minors they don't count off the just add to your grade. 3 big essays and that's it.

Dr. Fox-Defago is a super cool professor. All of the homework she offers is extra credit and gave me an extra letter grade in the class, and its all pretty easy too. She doesn't assign tests, just three papers and a final “portfolio” of what you learned in the semester. She also very clearly outlines what you need. Im taking her again!
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: I love her so much I would recommend to have her.
